TopicTitle: Part Collision with Ground fix mod - No more random part explosions!

Articles.Content: I'm getting a bit tired of parts exploding at their set collision speed no matter what angle they hit the ground. I was wondering if any of you wonderful people here had found a mod/workaround for that BESIDES modifying the collision tolerance for each part. Thanks for reading.
Bettery Buoyancy does this for water. That will get you half way there, and would make a good reference for anyone looking to create a similar mod for solid ground.
